attributes.action:
BAN THE BANG
Fireworks are killing our pets.
BAN THE BANG
attributes.additional_details:
ANIMALS ARE SUFFERING. 
Pet Owners Are Loosing The Lives Of Their Beloved Pets. 
ANIMALS ARE SUFFERING. 
ALL ANIMALS 
Cats, dogs, horses, rabbits, zoo animals, all animals are suffering with severe injury or death all because people think Fireworks are fun. People don't listen to the rules of not being allowed to use near livestock. So BAN THE BANG and save our poor animals that are SUFFERING! 
Noahs Ark Zoo have lost there baby zebra 'Hope' due to fireworks being set off close the her. Its hone beyond a joke now and we need to stop!
attributes.background:
Let people have their Fireworks, sparklers ect.
But stop them being allowed to use Fireworks that go bang. As people are still using them near livestock (farmers land, horses, zoos and many more)

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549758

While some fireworks are marketed as silent, these still make some noise. If you would like the Government to reduce the decibel limit to a specific level, you could start a new petition requesting this.

We have also published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Limit the Sale and Use of Fireworks to Organisers of Licensed Displays Only: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891

Ban the use of all fireworks in order to reduce air and noise pollution: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334448
